thread.title: Ground News - The last few weeks save the year
thread.title_full: Ground News - The last few weeks save the year

author: RÚV
title: Ground News - The last few weeks save the year
text:
Summary by RÚV After a rather sad year for the longest time, there has been a riotous run in the stock market, and the vast majority of companies have been right significantly out of the shed in recent weeks. For a long time the outlook was good for another disappointing year in the market, and for a time the stock index fell by 17 percent. The last quarter has been a true bull market, most clubs have right significantly out of the shed and the decline has lar… Share menu More
